title: Mac and C.H.E.E.S.E.
description: Detective Mac Machiavelli’s new partner is state-of-the-art robot C.H.E.E.S.E. (Computerized Humanoid Electronically Enhanced Secret Enforcer).
quote: If we learned one thing today C.H.E.E.S.E. it’s that cheerleaders and high explosives don’t mix.
altHero: Detective Mac and his robot partner, C.H.E.E.S.E.
alt1: Mac and C.H.E.E.S.E. talk in a dirty locker room
